Name: Dungeons and Myths 2
About the game: 'Dungeons and Myths 2' is a 2D tower defence game with a roguelike element. Place traps and monsters to defend your dungeon, pick upgrade after every wave of enemies! In the sequel, even more enemies are waiting for you, who are going to destroy your master. There are many more enemies, they have become more dangerous and faster. But you also got a couple of new tactics! Now units are also coming from your side that attack the enemy. This will allow you to gain experience and choose the trap or unit you need. Defeat all stupid invaders, these treasures are yours! Game features: Dynamic gameplay Nice pixel-art style 'Pick 1 out of 3' upgrade mechanics Interesting setting Steam Achievements support
